solution_line_template: First find the total numbers of marbles: {dilan_marbles} + {martha_marbles} + {phillip_marbles} + {veronica_marbles} = <<{dilan_marbles}+{martha_marbles}+{phillip_marbles}+{veronica_marbles}={total_marbles}>>{total_marbles} marbles
After sharing them equally each person will get {total_marbles} marbles / {num_friends} people = <<{total_marbles}/{num_friends}={marbles_per_friend}>>{marbles_per_friend} marbles/person
